name: FLIN!! and the Watching Someone Pee Simulator
name_original: FLIN!! and the Watching Someone Pee Simulator
description:
This is the Watching Someone Pee Simulator fan-game you have been waiting for. Play as FLIN in the most immersive Watching Someone Pee Simulator game yet!

To win you must simply help FLIN reach the other person in the bathroom by pressing the SPACE key at just the right time.

(The original Watching Someone Pee Simulator game franchise was made by the popular game developer FarawayDrip30. Check out his games!!)
